name: Chuy Cepeda
description:
In my journey, nothing beats the feeling of serving it to others and making a difference. I love to create and democratize it. Today, I'm all about spreading the word about web3 benefits through OS City.

I'm super passionate about freedom, trust, prosperity, and keeping us all connected. I truly believe we're on the cusp of something big, where we can lift each other up by changing the way we connect and do business.
